title: The Copyeditor's Handbook: A Guide
description:
The Copyeditor's Handbook: A Guide for Book Publishing and Corporate Communications by Amy Einsohn (Second Edition)

Overview: The Copyeditor's Handbook is a lively, practical manual for newcomers to publishing and for experienced editors who want to fine-tune their skills or broaden their understanding of the craft. This book may be used for self-instruction or as a textbook in copyediting classes. The exercises are accompanied by answer keys and detailed line-by-line explanations
